channel.title: Dungeoneering!
channel.description:
hey guys i jus added dungeoneering and i made it where you tele there it teleblocks you, but if you log out and relog you can tele whereever... its a problem.. so i want to know how to make it to where you log out in dungeoneering areas it teles you home instead of staying there..
ps. Dementhium based

item.title: Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

iownmyscape:

no like what document?

Whichever one handles player login.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

iownmyscape:

where would i add this?

Right after the player successfully logs in. Granted, you will have to change the names of the fields and methods to fit your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“iownmyscape, post:1, topic:429169”]hey guys i jus added dungeoneering and i made it where you tele there it teleblocks you, but if you log out and relog you can tele whereever… its a problem… so i want to know how to make it to where you log out in dungeoneering areas it teles you home instead of staying there…

ps. Dementhium based[/quote]

The best way would probably be to add a clause after a successful login.

// player successfully logged in; start normal operations
if (player.getLocation().isWithin(topLeft, bottomRight)) {
    player.setTeleBlocked(true);
}
// finish player loading and other details.

Read full topic
